entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:12 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
